 2019-03812019-04-23,  HC,  ,  , 
ActTobacco and Vaping Products Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedule 1 to the Tobacco and Vaping Products Act (Colouring Agents)
PrecisOrder Amending SCHEDULE 1 TO THE TOBACCO AND VAPING PRODUCTS ACT (COLOURING AGENTS) in order to align the restrictions on the use of colouring agents with the requirements set out in the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0108 Publication Date: 2019-05-01
